<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Tracks already seen files so they can be skipped.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollectorbase/#a82d3a5e3836b2c1ccd1e2ee012bfa586"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringset">StringSet&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollectorbase/#a82d3a5e3836b2c1ccd1e2ee012bfa586">Seen</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Captures file system interaction and generates data to be later replayed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with the RedirectingFileSystem.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For any file that gets accessed we eventually create:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - a copy of the file inside Root</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - a record in RedirectingFileSystem mapping that maps:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">///   current real path -&gt; path to the copy in Root</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// That intent is that later when the mapping is used by RedirectingFileSystem</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it simulates the state of FS that we collected.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We generate file copies and mapping lazily - see writeMapping and copyFiles.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We don&#39;t try to capture the state of the file at the exact time when it&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// accessed. Files might get changed, deleted ... we record only the &quot;final&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// state.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In order to preserve the relative topology of files we use their real paths</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as relative paths inside of the Root.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollector"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollector/#a2da94c8c4b02f2361f1add04a67b0a47">FileCollector</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollectorbase/#a8df2858d4a32c8a536815dcb01643400">FileCollectorBase</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Helper utility that encapsulates the logic for canonicalizing a virtual</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// path and a path to copy from.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollector/pathcanonicalizer"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollector/pathcanonicalizer">PathCanonicalizer</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecollector/pathcanonicalizer/pathstorage/#a8574a5ccd312738831cb2c404e6d78f9"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;256&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecollector/pathcanonicalizer/pathstorage/#a8574a5ccd312738831cb2c404e6d78f9">VirtualPath</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Canonicalize a pair of virtual and real paths.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecollector/pathcanonicalizer/pathstorage">PathStorage</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollector/pathcanonicalizer/#ac656bc9e1653748650e52573708cdf20">canonicalize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> SrcPath);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Replace with a (mostly) real path, or don&#39;t modify. Resolves symlinks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// in the directory, using \\a CachedDirs to avoid redundant lookups, but</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// leaves the filename as a possible symlink.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Root is the directory where collected files are will be stored.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Copy the files into the root directory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When StopOnError is true (the default) we abort as soon as one file</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// cannot be copied. This is relatively common, for example when a file was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// removed after it was added to the mapping.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
